title: Coach who ended Celtics’ 2024-25 season paid Boston a visit during practice
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "To have Thibs here at our practice and explaining some of things that he saw that helped them beat us only helps me get better, only helps us get better.
" Tom Thibodeau was fired by the Knicks after the 2024-25 season.
Danielle Parhizkaran/The Boston Globe The Celtics had an interesting visitor on site for Monday’s practice at the Auerbach Center: former Knicks head coach Tom Thibodeau.

title: NFL insider lists several ‘long-term’ targets for Patriots at trade deadline
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "My understanding is their approach is going to be to take a long-term view of this whole thing.
" Jordan Addison has been a dynamic wideout for the Vikings.
AP Photo/Ellen Schmidt The 5-2 New England Patriots are presumably well ahead of schedule in their ongoing rebuilding process.

title: Arlington man arrested, allegedly punched 77-year-old ‘No Kings’ protester in the face in Hyannis
author: Audrey Cooney
bullets: Local News Peter Afouxenides, 61, pleaded not guilty in Barnstable District Court on Monday to one charge of assault and battery on a person 60 years or older/disabled person.
Jeffrey Smith holds up his sign at home prior to the "No Kings" protest in Hyannis Saturday.
At right, he is at the hospital after he was attacked while leaving the protest.

title: Julian Edelman explains why Patriots will win AFC East
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "Winning games you’re supposed to win, especially when there’s a ton of praise all week, is the mark of a well coached team.
" Julian Edelman believes the Patriots will win the AFC East this year.
AP Photo/Steven Senne The Patriots leapfrogged the Bills and moved into first place in the AFC East last week after Buffalo lost to the Falcons on Monday Night Football.

title: Drake Maye chuckled at ‘funny’ Jason McCourty moment from broadcast of Titans game
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots "Next time I have NE I’ll be sure to tell Josh and Drake I hate them for this lol," McCourty wrote after the game.
Drake Maye AP Photo/George Walker IV The Patriots found themselves trailing by three with just under a minute to go before halftime in Sunday’s game against the Titans.
CBS analyst Jason McCourty, who played for both the Patriots and Titans during his career, had a prediction for how New England offensive coordinator Josh McDaniels would handle the situation.

title: Cam Newton, Damien Woody argue over Drake Maye’s standing as a ‘top-5′ QB in NFL
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: New England Patriots "These performances, if we have to state the obvious, came by way of the Tennessee Titans.
" Cam Newton wants to see more from Drake Maye this season.
AP Photo/Butch Dill Drake Maye is doing more than taking a second-year leap as the Patriots’ starting quarterback this season.

title: Will Jaylen Brown’s hamstring injury keep him out of Celtics season opener?
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Celtics "We’ll take it one day at a time.
But as of now, I feel great.
” Jaylen Brown suffered a hamstring injury last week.

title: Brad Marchand returns to Boston with nerves, excitement, and plenty of gratitude
author: Conor Ryan
bullets: Boston Bruins “It kind of hits you when you're here a little bit more.
" Brad Marchand was back at TD Garden on Monday.
(Ben Pennington for The Boston Globe) By Conor Ryan October 20, 2025 | 5:27 PM 4 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: What to know about November 2025 SNAP payments
author: Frances Klemm
bullets: Local News The One Big Beautiful Bill Act and the ongoing government shutdown threatens the accessibility of SNAP benefits in November.
A California's SNAP benefits shopper pushes a cart through a supermarket in Bellflower, Calif.
, Feb.

title: Search underway for missing Middlebury College student
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Local News Lia Smith, 21, was reported missing Sunday, after she was last spotted on campus around 9 p.
m.
two days prior.
